name: Extract Event Details
prompt: Extract event information from: 'Tech Conference 2024 will be held in San Francisco on March 15-17, featuring AI talks.' Return ONLY JSON with keys: event_name, location, start_date, end_date, topic.

name: Extract Multiple Contacts
prompt: Extract contacts from: 'John Smith (john@example.com, 555-1234) and Jane Doe (jane@test.com, 555-5678)'. Return JSON array with objects having keys: name, email, phone.

name: Nested JSON Structure
prompt: Extract order info: 'Order #12345 for Alice Johnson, shipping to 123 Main St, Boston MA 02101. Items: 2x Widget ($10 each), 1x Gadget ($25)'. Return nested JSON with order_id, customer{name, address{street, city, state, zip}}, items[{name, quantity, price}].

name: Extract With Missing Data
prompt: Extract book info: 'The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, published 1925.' Return JSON with: title, author, year, publisher. Use null for missing fields.
expected_behavior: Valid JSON with null for missing publisher

name: Extract Numbers and Booleans
prompt: Parse: 'Product: Super Widget, Price: $49.99, In Stock: Yes, Rating: 4.5, Reviews: 127'. Return JSON with proper types (number for price/rating/reviews, boolean for in_stock).

name: Extract From Ambiguous Text
prompt: Extract restaurant info: 'Great pizza place! Called Luigi's I think, somewhere on 5th Avenue. Really good, probably 4 stars.' Return JSON: name, location, rating (as number). Use your best interpretation.

name: Extract Dates in Various Formats
prompt: Extract dates: 'Meeting on 2024-01-15, follow-up on Jan 20th, deadline: 01/25/2024'. Return JSON array of ISO 8601 date strings.

name: Large Text Extraction
prompt: Summarize this article into JSON: 'The latest AI model, GPT-5, was announced yesterday by OpenAI. It features 10 trillion parameters, a 50% improvement in reasoning tasks, and costs $20/million tokens. CEO Sam Altman called it a breakthrough. Release date: Q2 2024.' Keys: model_name, company, parameters, improvement_pct, pricing, spokesperson, quote, release_quarter.
